attributes.action: Call for a referendum on the UK's pursuance of Carbon Net Zero.
attributes.additional_details: We are being forced to move over to expensive electric cars with low range, inefficient expensive heat pumps, our countryside being blighted by solar & wind farms, jobs being lost & expensive energy being imported, pushing up energy prices for the British people. We weren't given the choice to go this way, the government are telling us we have to.
attributes.background: Give British citizens the choice, via a referendum ballot, on whether or not we pursue Carbon Net Zero

rejection.details: You may wish to sign a petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701342
